definitions.definition: The period in a woman's life when menstruation becomes irregular and less frequent before eventually stopping altogether, usually accompanied by a range of unpleasant symptoms ; the period spanning perimenopause up to postmenopause .
The final menstrual period of a woman after which ovulation no longer occurs.

main_definition: The period in a woman's life when menstruation becomes irregular and less frequent before eventually stopping altogether, usually accompanied by a range of unpleasant symptoms ; the period spanning perimenopause up to postmenopause .
secondary_definitions: The final menstrual period of a woman after which ovulation no longer occurs.
